mapper.insert: insert into film(film_id, title, description, release_year, language_id, original_language_id, rental_duration, rental_rate, length, replacement_cost, rating, special_features, last_update) values(#{film_id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{release_year}, #{language_id}, #{original_language_id}, #{rental_duration}, #{rental_rate}, #{length}, #{replacement_cost}, #{rating,special_features}, #{last_update})
